body:
First story.. idk what happened.. didn't they want the kid? How can they let her marry him? Won't the brother come after both of them? Maybe he'll just marry someone else ...  Then will be unable to impregnate her again and boom will slowly make a harem for the smaller brother lol
2nd story.. that kid is stupid AF.. Idk how her husband is who doesn't even doubt her when she gets pregnant.. does she even know who the dad is? Lmao
3rd story.. it's just fcked up .. no logic just sex.. so fine ..
The second story was stupid but it’s was OkY 6/10
@ClockworkGod your most recent is garbage so you shouldn't talk 👎👎👎👎👎👎
Just wanted to be the most recent comment 😜🤑🔥😤😭🤪
this story is not at all entertaining. it's not fun or enjoyable to read and kills boners.

The way the first story ended was kinda garbage. I would've kicked her without hesitation. Wasn't crazy about the second one either, though it kinda shows how teachers end up getting caught and fired for having sex with their students.
Best teacher ever.  Worst wife but best teacher.
My god the stupidity of that kid in the second story is just... raaagh.

lol that kid who got bullied is so stupid. I have no pity on him. telling the bullies  ''just dont tell anyone ok?'' lol he could have the teacher all by himself. That kid will get cucked so hard if he have a girfriend/wife
I like the first story, but after second story i dont know anymore
Well.... she is just a whore, and he isn't virgin anymore and now probably married to a decent girl. It's worth
Okay, that boy was stupid.  Plain and simple. How could you show people who bully you something that is forbidden when you are beta as f@ck.  Rule #1: Sharing is NOT always caring bruh
It eventually got better, but seeing that kid who fucked his teacher....i felt really bad for him. getting bullied and then being raped like that >_>. felt mean man.
